meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kristin Frankhouser Kate Dzurilla Dan Amboy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3925.

td.p: Kristin Frankhouser, a 12-year-old from Baton Rouge, Louisiana
Kate Dzurilla, a 12-year-old from Syosset, New York
Dan Amboy, a 12-year-old from Lapeer, Michigan

tr.td: U.S. PRESIDENTS
KIDS' SONGS
SKOOL DAZE
I'M SO CUTE!
DR. SEUSS
TW"EEN"S

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'During his March 4, 1905 inauguration, this "Rough Rider" wore a ring that had been worn by Abraham Lincoln')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
